blessing: Allah Ya cika ranakunka da haske.
discoverTitle: Gano sabon ilimi da abubuwan al'ajabi tare da Deen Ai
learnHadithText: Nemo haske da shiriya ga yadda kake ji, ta hanyar Al-Qur'ani ko Hadisi.
reflectionMessage: Rubuta abin da wannan aya ke nufi a gare ka...
editReflectionMessage: Sabunta tunaninka game da wannan aya...
reflectBox: Raba tunaninka, fahimtarka, ko tunani na kanka akan wannan aya...
reflectSuccessText: An kara tunaninka a cikin kundin rubutunka, wuri da zaka iya dawowa a kowane lokaci don samun kwanciyar hankali da tunani.
